sourceMeaningMnemonic: You can <radical>eat</radical> all you want, but you'll still <radical>lack</radical> something to <kanji>drink</kanji>. You can't live just from eating, you have to drink things too!
meaningInfo: Imagine eating and eating and lacking a delicious, cold, thirst-quenching drink. Your mouth is dry. You have to drink something, anything!
readingMnemonic: You get desperate for a <kanji>drink</kanji> and put some <reading>no</reading>ri (<ja>の</ja>) seaweed in a blender, trying to create a drink of your own.
readingInfo: Luckily, this nori isn't dried and pressed like they usually are, and you manage to make a bright green nori drink. You gulp it down, and even though it tastes like the ocean, it hits the spot!
